summary:
Adds a new AWESOME weapon to the game.
Currently has the Dawnbreaker\'s texture....
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------Stats------------------------------------
Damage: 30
Weight: 10
Value: 5000
Enchantment: Dawnbreaker\'s Enchantment with 5000 charges
Type: One-handed Sword
Speed: 1.8500 (Almost twice as fast as the original speed for Swords)
Crafting Recipe: Blacksmith Forge under the MISC. category and no need for any perk
2 Leather Strips
2 Gold Ingots
1 Fire Salts
Tempering Recipe: 
1 Gold Ingot
-----------------------------------Installation--------------------------------------
1) Extract \"Infernus.esp\" to your Data folder in your Skyrim directory
2) Open your \"SkyrimLauncher.exe\" and click \"Data Files\" and check if \"Infernus.esp\" is ticked
3) \"Data Files\" is grayed out? Add this line on the TOP of your \"SkyrimPrefs.ini\" which is located at Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim.

[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection = 1
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Video: (Coming Soon)
Other Mods: The Quickdraw - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9741
Credits: Bethesda for making Skyrim,Creation Kit,and the Dawnbreaker Texture

REMEMBER IF YOU LIKE IT ENDORSE IT
author: CarlosCH1221
